div.p:
Melbourne 11th Jany 187[7]
Document is a printed form (p. 21) with handwritten record on a separate sheet (p. 299), of the details filled in at the appropriate places on copies sent to different departments. The year is established as 1877 by the following entry in the register, which is dated '11th Jany 1877'.

p.style: margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in; text-align: start; hyphenation-ladder-count: no-limit; font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; hyphenate: false; hyphenation-remain-char-count: 2; hyphenation-push-char-count: 2;

margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in; text-align: start; hyphenation-ladder-count: no-limit; font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; hyphenate: false; hyphenation-remain-char-count: 2; hyphenation-push-char-count: 2;

div.p:
I have the honor to transmit herewith the document noted in the margin,
Marginal note: 1 parcel.
received from the Royl. Acady. of Sciences, Munich.
